text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with coke aquino or as I like to

want to show you how to use the sausage
you can basically braise this in

the technique of using the sausage

onion added my beans alright and some

some red pepper flakes some dried

must be very traditional now before it
goes in the beans we have to poke a

this is going to come to a simmer of
course any time we're simmering any kind

to low and we're gonna let that sausage
slowly braised in those beans until the

about an hour okay
now I got some bad news the light was
